special.elf: You can spend 1 ENERGY ahead of an ACTION ROLL to get +1D.
special.avian: You can spend 1 ENERGY to make a long jump or glide through air.
special.geon: You can spend 1 ENERGY to resist losing a HEART.
special.aquarian: You can spend 1 ENERGY to swim long distances underwater or attack while in water.
special.seedling: You can spend 1 ENERGY to turn invisible for as long as you stay still.
